title: Trade my T212 Gandil for your T205 Cobb?
author: Leon

posts.post_title: Trade my T212 Gandil for your T205 Cobb?
posts.post_content:
See title. Cobb has to be acceptable of course. Looking for a nicely centered example with very little chipping on the boarders. A mild wrinkle on the back, or paper loss on a blank area of the back, would be perfect. :)

Edited to add, I would be happy to kick in quite a few greenbacks with this card to get the Cobby I am looking for.

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pt212gandil2.jpg[/IMG]

Wow what a card .If I had the right T205 Cobb we'd be talking . The only thing that I have is a Dan Koteles 1966 Fruit of the Loom brown and white Kotton thin stitch version. WHy do I miss out?

Merry Christmas Leon,nice card !
Think I will pass on the brown Fruit of the Loom. Happy Holidays Dan!!
